widget.name: WB Learning lite
widget.description: Dlab Learning equips anyone exploring the potential of open data with the strategic and practical skills necessary to make the most of open data. This application contains interactive modules that use videos, visuals and quizzes to cement learning and reward progress with badges. Other than the videos, all learning can be done offline, so if you have a train or plane journey then this application is the ideal way to learn all about open data.
widget.author: The Open Data Institute
